settings.answer_faqs:
No, not at all. A cubic zirconia is not a diamond. Cubic Zirconia what is called a diamond simulant—an
inexpensive imitation. It simulates the appearance of a diamond but has none of the same optical or
physical properties. Made For You Lab-Grown Diamonds are as real as the diamonds made by Mother Nature, billions of years ago.

Our scientists have discovered a way to replicate the same extreme high temperature and high-pressure
conditions that existed long ago, deep within the Earth, when mined diamonds were formed. They start
with a tiny diamond “seed”, place it in a carbon-rich environment and then monitor and control the
conditions while our diamonds are created. It’s a process we take painstaking care in to ensure every
diamond we make for you is as beautiful as can be.

settings.question_faqs: Do they look the same as mined diamonds?
settings.answer_faqs:
Yes, Made For You Lab-Grown Diamonds look exactly the same as polished diamonds. Even the top
gemological grading labs in the world cannot tell the difference without sophisticated equipment.

settings.question_faqs: Are they better than mined diamonds?
settings.answer_faqs:
Well, it’s a matter of opinion. There’s a lot to like about Made For You Lab-Grown Diamonds. We all
know how important the environment is, and since we make every one of our diamonds, we don’t have
to disturb or damage the landscape to dig them up. Also, in some parts of the world, diamonds have
historically fueled violent conflict. Many people like the fact that they know Made For You Lab-Grown
Diamonds don’t carry any such baggage and they know exactly where their diamond came from

Great question! You might think that the technology necessary to recreate the conditions under which
diamonds are formed is hugely expensive (and you would be right!) But we’ve perfected our process and
now have it down to a science (literally), so we’re able to maximize efficiency. This means we’re able to
offer jewelry made with higher quality Made For You Lab-Grown Diamonds at significantly lower prices
than jewelry made with mined diamonds.

settings.question_faqs: What quality are Made For You Lab-Grown Diamonds?
settings.answer_faqs:
Every Made For You Lab-Grown Diamond is at least an I-J color and an I-1 clarity, although many of our
diamonds grade higher than that. These are higher quality diamonds than that found in many similarly
priced jewelry collections using mined diamonds.
Ofcourse! Our diamonds are forever and the jewelry we make for you may be enjoyed and passed down from generation to generation.

settings.title: Diamonds Made By You
settings.banner_des:
If you can’t find anything that you really love, why not create it? We give you the
opportunity to choose everything from the diamond size to the setting to create
unique pieces of jewellery that are truly one in a million!

settings.slide-des: Lab-grown diamonds have the exact same chemical composition as natural diamonds.

settings.title: Our Story
settings.des: Our origin story and our background – find out everything you need to know about the brand you love.

settings.top_message_text: Free Shipping Masterfully Cut No Mining

settings.des1: I love how easy it is for me to find what I’m looking for. I can search for diamond jewelry based on the occasion or the moment I’m celebrating! The wide collection also means I can find pieces that match my style exactly. Absolutely super!

Finally we have brands for lab-grown diamonds in India. It’s the best choice for me as it’s within my budget and I feel I am contributing to the environment in some way. This is my small step towards sustainable development

What I love the most about these diamonds is that that are completely sustainable and do not require any mining. The icing on top is the fact that I can get a bigger and better quality diamond within the same budget!

settings.title: About Us
settings.content:
In a world where trends last shorter than an instagram story, Made For You draws on the rich tradition and legacy of parent company, Renaissance Global, which is more than 25 years old.

Over the last two and a half decades, Renaissance Global has consistently set industry benchmarks and developed a wide range of luxury lifestyle products including licensed collections for some of the world’s leading brands such as Hallmark and Disney.

settings.title:
What are Made For You Lab
Grown Diamonds?
settings.content:
• Real diamonds created using the latest technology
  • Physically, optically and chemically like diamonds mined from the Earth
  • Reasonably priced for maximum value

settings.title: Respect For The Craft
settings.banner_des:
• Each Made For You Lab-Grown Diamond is a masterpiece of artistry and craftsmanship
  • Highly-trained experts cut and polished each diamond to release its inner fire and brilliance
  • Made For You Lab-Grown Diamonds are cut for maximum beauty.

settings.title: What Are Lab-Grown Diamonds? Are They Real?

settings.banner_des:
To put it very simply, a lab-grown diamond is a diamond that is grown in a laboratory. Many people wonder whether something that is grown in a lab can be considered a real diamond.

The short answer is, yes! Lab-grown diamonds are real diamonds. In fact, they have the same chemical and physical composition as mined diamonds. But, we totally get that you need more than just our word. To help you understand why lab-grown diamonds are the real deal, let’s take a look at how they are created.

settings.spotlight_block_title: What makes our diamonds one of kind & special
settings.spotlight_block_des: Watch our short film to know

settings.title: Are Lab-Grown Diamonds for Me?
settings.banner_des: Diamonds have always been regarded as a symbol of everlasting love and affection. Over the years, they’ve become everybody’s best friend and their demand has increased. But there have also been several concerns regarding the way diamonds are mined and the impact it has on us and the environment. For the conscious consumer, lab-grown diamonds are a fabulous alternative. These engineered diamonds are 100% real and are lighter on your wallet and your conscience. If you’re wondering what makes lab-grown diamonds the right choice for you, let’s take a look at a few facts.
settings.title2: How Can I Be Sure of the Quality of My Lab-Grown Diamond?
settings.banner_des2: When you decide to purchase a diamond, it’s generally to mark an important milestone in your life. You may have just earned your first salary, or you might even be picking out a diamond ring for your engagement. Whatever the reason, the purchase of a diamond can be an emotional affair. And while it is easy to get caught up in the moment, it’s vital that you ensure that the diamond you get is the diamond you’ve paid for. But, without the requisite knowledge or technical knowhow, how do you know if the diamond you’ve been given is actually the right weight, cut or clarity that you’ve asked for?
settings.title3: Lab-Grown Diamonds – The Science Behind the Process
settings.banner_des3: Scientists have tried replicating the natural diamond process for several years now. Even though experiments started as early as 1893, the lab-grown processes used today were first formulated around 1954. After years of perfecting the process, lab-grown diamonds can now easily be created in one of two ways. Based on the process used, lab-grown diamonds can be of two types – High Pressure High Temperature (HPHT) or Chemical Vapour Deposition (CVD).
settings.banner_des4: Diamonds are known for their gorgeous sparkle and beautiful shine. But in order to keep your jewellery looking as good as new, it’s important that you take the time to clean your diamond jewellery regularly. If you’re wondering how to keep your lab-grown diamonds bright and shiny, here’s everything you need to know about cleaning and storing your diamond jewellery.
settings.title5: The Four Cs of a Diamond
settings.banner_des5: Every diamond, whether lab-grown or mined, is classified using 4 Cs – cut, carat, colour and clarity. We may have all heard these terms before, but let’s take a minute to understand what they mean and how they affect the quality of our diamonds.
settings.title6: Understanding What’s Real and What’s Fake
settings.banner_des6: Diamonds are known for their gorgeous sparkle and beautiful shine. But in order to keep your jewellery looking as good as new, it’s important that you take the time to clean your diamond jewellery regularly. If you’re wondering how to keep your lab-grown diamonds bright and shiny, here’s everything you need to know about cleaning and storing your diamond jewellery.
settings.title7: Understanding What’s Real and What’s Fake
settings.banner_des7: Diamonds are known for their gorgeous sparkle and beautiful shine. But in order to keep your jewellery looking as good as new, it’s important that you take the time to clean your diamond jewellery regularly. If you’re wondering how to keep your lab-grown diamonds bright and shiny, here’s everything you need to know about cleaning and storing your diamond jewellery.
